prompt: Make a website for a institute that primarily focuces on coding, development and DSA.
refinedPrompt: Create a website for an institute that specializes in teaching coding, software development, and data structures and algorithms (DSA). The website should have a modern design, be responsive, and include the following pages: Home, About Us, Courses (with detailed curriculum for each course), Faculty, Events, and Contact Us. Implement a user-friendly navigation menu and include relevant images and videos throughout the site. Optimize the website for search engines and ensure fast loading times.
